June 1, 1925 D Chepstow Contest
Chepstow Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
chepstow-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Echoes of the Opera
Castle Grounds, Chepstow, Monmouthshire Prizes - 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £10, 3rd £5. March contest (British Legion) - 1st Pillowell, 2nd Yorkley Onward. Article page 4 Brass Band News June 1926 states Metropolitan were later disqualified. Cradley only played in march contest 7 bands competed.
Dec. 10, 2013, 3:02 p.m. March 5, 2021, 10:53 a.m.
1 Metropolitan Works (Birmingham) George Henry Wilson
2 Yorkley Onward Band T. Valentine
3 Glastonbury Brass R. W. Davison
4 John Thompson Works Band Unknown
4 Pillowell Silver Band Unknown
Unknown Result Cradley Excelsior Unknown
